title: Number Comparison
description:
Write a program that checks if a number is big or small.

The variable 'number' is set to 15.

Write an if/else statement:
- If number > 10, print: Big number
- Otherwise, print: Small number

Expected output: Big number
instructions:
Write a program that checks if a number is big or small.

The variable 'number' is set to 15.

Write an if/else statement:
- If number > 10, print: Big number
- Otherwise, print: Small number

Expected output: Big number

testCases.description: Should print 'Big number' when number is 15
Edge case: number is exactly 10 (boundary value)
Tests else branch: numbers <= 10 are small

hints.text: Use IO.println() to display output to the console.
Create a variable to store your value. In java, use appropriate syntax.
Use an if statement to check the condition.
If stuck, try writing out the solution in plain English first, then convert to java code.
